description: [APT5](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1023) has made modifications to the crontab file including in `/var/cron/tabs/`.(Citation: NSA APT5 Citrix Threat Hunting December 2022)

external_references.description: National Security Agency. (2022, December). APT5: Citrix ADC Threat Hunting Guidance. Retrieved February 5, 2024.
external_references.source_name: NSA APT5 Citrix Threat Hunting December 2022
